instructions: Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, then tap Music.
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, then tap Music. Under Playlists & Albums, tap Add Music. Select albums and playlists to add them to your Apple Watch.
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, then tap Workout. Tap Workout Playlist, then choose a playlist.

Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, then tap Music. Turn off any automatically added playlists you don t want on your Apple Watch. To remove playlists and albums you ve added to your Apple Watch, tap Edit, then tap the Delete button next to the unwanted items.
